title: Xerath Skin Concept

replies.body: I want a xerath skin thats just his base model of the electric stick figure under the armor.  Use his taunt and when his armor expands its really easy to see.
DO NOT WANT. but nj with the look.{{summoner:14}}

Fantastic doodle! 

I feel like it's such a departure from his current skins that I'd want to see the idea flushed out a bit more. The biggest problem with a such a design is readability, I don't think Riot will depart from a glowing core for that reason. If the design can wrap around a glowing core then it could look pretty good.
